titleStmt.title: The virgin saint, or, A brief narrative of the holy life and Christian death of Mary Wilson with some memorable passages, and occasional speeches a little before her death added thereunto ; to which is also adjoyned a sermon, preached at her funeral by Mr. Geo. Nicholson, together with several consolatory letters, written by divers ministers, to her mournful father, Mr. Richard Wilson of Crosfield in Cumberland.
titleStmt.author: S. A.
Nicholson, George, ca. 1637-1697. Sermon preached at the funeral of Mrs. Mary Wilson.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: faded and tightly bound with loss of text.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
